original_title: Jakers! Treasure Hunt On Raloo Farm
overview: JakersÂ´ adventure is about the eight year old pig Jakers and his friends, Dannan the duck and bull Fernie who lives on a farm in Ireland. Each episode starts with Jakers, who today is the grandfather of three little pigs, tell interesting stories from his childhood ...
